Class FusedBatchNorm.Inputs<T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber>

java.lang.Object
org.tensorflow.op.RawOpInputs<FusedBatchNorm<T,U>>
org.tensorflow.op.nn.FusedBatchNorm.Inputs<T,U>
Enclosing class:
FusedBatchNorm<T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber>
public static class FusedBatchNorm.Inputs<T extends TNumber, U extends TNumber> extends RawOpInputs<FusedBatchNorm<T,U>>

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    dataFormat
    The data format for x and y.
    final float
    epsilon
    A small float number added to the variance of x.
    final float
    exponentialAvgFactor
    The exponentialAvgFactor attribute
    final boolean
    isTraining
    A bool value to indicate the operation is for training (default) or inference.
    final Operand<U>
    mean
    A 1D Tensor for population mean.
    final Operand<U>
    offset
    A 1D Tensor for offset, to shift to the normalized x.
    final Operand<U>
    scale
    A 1D Tensor for scaling factor, to scale the normalized x.

    T
    The data type for the elements of input and output Tensors.
    final DataType
    U
    The data type for the scale, offset, mean, and variance.
    final Operand<U>
    variance
    A 1D Tensor for population variance.
    final Operand<T>
    x
    A 4D Tensor for input data.

  • Field Details

    • x

      public final Operand<T extends TNumber> x
      A 4D Tensor for input data.

    • scale

      public final Operand<U extends TNumber> scale
      A 1D Tensor for scaling factor, to scale the normalized x.

    • offset

      public final Operand<U extends TNumber> offset
      A 1D Tensor for offset, to shift to the normalized x.

    • mean

      public final Operand<U extends TNumber> mean
      A 1D Tensor for population mean. Used for inference only; must be empty for training.

    • variance

      public final Operand<U extends TNumber> variance
      A 1D Tensor for population variance. Used for inference only; must be empty for training.

    • T

      public final DataType T
      The data type for the elements of input and output Tensors.

    • U

      public final DataType U
      The data type for the scale, offset, mean, and variance.

    • epsilon

      public final float epsilon
      A small float number added to the variance of x.

    • exponentialAvgFactor

      public final float exponentialAvgFactor
      The exponentialAvgFactor attribute

    • dataFormat

      public final String dataFormat
      The data format for x and y. Either "NHWC" (default) or "NCHW".

    • isTraining

      public final boolean isTraining
      A bool value to indicate the operation is for training (default) or inference.
